title: Update hero heading text to styled “HR ACADEMY”

requirements.text: On the Home page hero section, remove the existing “Welcome to HR Academy” heading text and instead display “HR ACADEMY” as a two-part styled heading where “HR” is white and “ACADEMY” is red.

quotes: Remove "Welcome to HR Academy " and instead add "HR ACADEMY " where "HR" is in white and "ACADEMY " in red

acceptanceCriteria: In the hero H1 on the Home page, the displayed title reads exactly “HR ACADEMY”.
The “HR” portion of the title is rendered in white and the “ACADEMY” portion is rendered in red (using the app’s existing red accent styling, e.g., `text-accent-red`).
The string “Welcome to HR Academy” is no longer shown in the hero heading in either normal or preview mode.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change backend data models, stored homepage content, or the admin editing workflow for homepage content.
Do not redesign other parts of the header, footer, or navigation.
